title: French tuxedo cat 'Pierre' goes missing for 1 year, travels over 1,200 miles and 3 countries, eventually gets found in Telford, England and is wholesomely reunited with his pawrents
description: Now that summer is here, feline fam, we're feeling like we need to set off on a new adventure. See some new sights, try new cuisines, and meet new people! That sounds great and all, but how will we pawssibly be able to pay for it? Well, we could do it just like Pierre, the main kitty of our story below! This bold tuxedo cat went missing from his home in Calais, France, more than one year ago. He hitched rides with several trucks and eventually ended up in Telford, England. That's over 1,200 miles away and over the span of three countries!We're sure that Pierre's trip wasn't all sunshine and rainbows. It's hard to be a cat living off the streets. But the impawtant part is that Pierre, whose real name is actually 'Ushuaia', is safe and wholesomely reunited with his pawrents. Now that's what we call an adventure! Scroll down to read more about this kitty on a business trip below!Your inbox deserves hissterical cat content. We deliver. Weekly. Subscribe here.
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: French tuxedo cat 'Pierre' goes missing for 1 year, travels over 1,200 miles and 3 countries, eventually gets found in Telford, England and is wholesomely reunited with his pawrents - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Now that summer is here, feline fam, we're feeling like we need to set off on a new adventure. See some new sights, try new cuisines, and meet new people! That sounds great and all, but how will we pawssibly be able to pay for it? Well, we could do it just like Pierre, the main kitty of our story below! This bold tuxedo cat went missing from his home in Calais, France, more than one year ago. He hitched rides with several trucks and eventually ended up in Telford, England. That's over 1,200 miles away and over the span of three countries!

We're sure that Pierre's trip wasn't all sunshine and rainbows. It's hard to be a cat living off the streets. But the impawtant part is that Pierre, whose real name is actually 'Ushuaia', is safe and wholesomely reunited with his pawrents. Now that's what we call an adventure!
